articles.title: BYD confirms Denza luxury SUVs to launch in Australia next month
articles.author: David Mccowen
articles.summary: BYD is launching its Denza luxury brand in Australia next month with two SUVs, the Denza B5 and Denza B8. The Denza B5 shares hardware with the BYD Shark 6 and features a plug-in hybrid driveline, while the Denza B8 has a 2.0-litre motor and 550kW of hybrid power. These models are intended to offer a luxury alternative with off-road capabilities.

articles.title: 27 Products You'll Want If You Push Off Cleaning
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Dawn introduces Powerwash, a versatile cleaner for various surfaces. Bissell launches the Little Green cleaner, targeting stains on multiple surfaces for parents and pet owners. Rubbermaid releases an electric power scrubber brush to tackle tough stains, Eufy introduces a robot vacuum for convenient home cleaning.

articles.title: Which Roku streaming stick should you buy in 2025? My verdict after testing every model
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Roku has introduced updated Streaming Sticks featuring a refreshed design. The article details the performance of these new Roku devices in a home setting.

articles.title: What does a dual-branded Applebee's \u0026 IHOP look like?
articles.author: Wausau Daily Herald
articles.summary: Applebee's and IHOP will open a dual-branded location in Wausau. This represents a new service offering from both companies within that specific location.

articles.title: Deebot X11 OmniCyclone review: Is this $3k robot vacuum worth it?
articles.author: Mark Furler
articles.summary: Ecovacs Robotics has launched the Deebot X11 OmniCyclone, a robotic vacuum and mop with advanced features like GaN charging, adaptive four-wheel drive, and AI-powered cleaning. It boasts improved dust and hair removal, and a self-cleaning station, and is priced at $2999.

articles.title: Virtual hard disks are my favorite hidden feature in Windows 11: Here's why
articles.author: Tashreef Shareef
articles.summary: Microsoft has introduced a new feature in Windows 11 that simplifies the creation of virtual hard disks (VHDs) through the Settings app. This update allows users to easily create separate, isolated environments for projects, testing, or dual-booting operating systems without complex partitioning.

articles.title: Howard Johnson Releases Fried Clam Soap in Honor of the Company's 100th Anniversary
articles.author: Stacy Lambe
articles.summary: Howard Johnson is launching HoJo's Original Fried Clam Soap in honor of its centennial. The soap, inspired by the restaurant's fried clam strips, is available for $19.25 at Hojo.com/100 and is also offered as a free gift at select hotels with a specific code.

articles.title: Phoenix Dental Agency Launches Authentic Media to Help Dentists Build Patient Trust and Boost Case Acceptance
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Phoenix Dental Agency, a marketing division of Productive Dentist Academy, launched Authentic Media Production, a new service to help dental practices use authentic photos and videos. Authentic Media offers on-site photo and video production. Practices using authentic video and photo content see up to a 35% increase in case acceptance according to HubSpot.

articles.title: Nectar Mattress Sale October 2025
articles.author: Maya Gandara
articles.summary: Nectar is offering sales of up to 50% off on mattresses and up to 66% on bedding and accessory bundles. All four Nectar mattress models (Classic, Premier, Luxe, and Ultra) were revamped this year, with sales on memory foam and hybrid models and associated bundles. Nectar also offers mattress bundles.

articles.title: Wendy's Debuts "Tendys" on Menus Nationwide
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Wendy's has launched new Chicken Tenders as a core menu item, available nationwide in three- or four-piece options, accompanied by six new dipping sauces. Select restaurants will be rebranded as 'Tendy's' in October to promote the new chicken tenders.

articles.title: Narins Beauty Announces First Product Launch: BunBun Lip Jelly Tint
articles.summary: Narins Beauty has launched its first product, the BunBun Lip Jelly Tint, a collection of buildable color sticks and a pH-reactive balm designed to deliver a glossy finish with hydration. The product is available exclusively at NarinsBeauty.com, retailing at 89 AED.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works Is Selling the Cutest Mini Scent Diffuser for $20
articles.author: Cassidy Dawn Graves
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is launching a Wallflower plug-in diffuser that resembles a mini KitchenAid stand mixer. This fragrance diffuser and night-light plugs into a wall outlet and diffuses fragrance oil for about a month.

articles.title: October Prime Day is next week — but this 'spacious' Ninja air fryer is already 40% off
articles.author: Brittany Barber
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 40% discount on the Ninja air fryer for Prime members, reducing the price from $260 to $157. The Ninja air fryer is an 8-in-1 appliance that can air fry, roast, broil, bake, toast, dehydrate and keep warm, and offers customizable toast settings.

articles.title: Chipotle Reveals New Red Chimichurri Sauce
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill introduced Red Chimichurri, a new chef-driven sauce, available for a limited time in Canada starting September 30, 2025. Made with roasted garlic, fresh cilantro, chili peppers, and citrus juice, the sauce will be offered free to Chipotle Rewards members on launch day. The company suggests pairings of the sauce with Carne Asada Burrito, Chicken Bowl, and Sofritas Bowl.

articles.title: Laundry Do's & Don'ts for 2025
articles.author: Tanya Rivera
articles.summary: Consumer Reports recommends Tide Plus Ultra Stain Release for tough stains, costing 88 cents a load. For everyday messes, Costco's Kirkland Signature detergent is a budget-friendly option at 14 cents a load. The report suggests alternatives for fabric softeners and dryer sheets like reusable wool dryer balls and recommends using the dryer's automatic cycle.

articles.title: Google AI Mode adds Visual Search capabilities for shopping
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google has launched an update to its AI Mode search feature, enabling conversational visual searches for shopping. Users can now describe products using natural language and reference images, refining results with follow-up requests. The feature leverages Google's visual search fan-out technique, Gemini 2.5, and the Shopping Graph to deliver relevant shoppable options.

articles.title: Google brings AI to the home with new cameras, doorbell and speaker
articles.author: The Los Angeles Times
articles.summary: Google introduced new Nest-branded hardware, following Amazon's product showcase. Google is prioritizing the rollout of Gemini for Home to existing smart speakers and displays.

articles.title: Instant Pot launches mini multi-cooker that's perfect for solo diners and students
articles.author: Alice Reynolds
articles.summary: Instant Pot has launched a new mini multi-cooker, a smaller version of their bestselling appliance. This space-saving and stylish multi-cooker combines baking, air frying, slow cooking, and pressure cooking functions. It is targeted at solo diners and students.

articles.title: Guess the missing word in this headline: Australian dock worker ________ after telling coworkers he put penis in sandwich
articles.summary: Innovate Solutions has launched AssistAI, an AI-powered customer service platform designed to reduce customer wait times and improve satisfaction. The platform leverages natural language processing and machine learning for real-time customer interaction. Innovate Solutions secured $5 million in seed funding to support the launch.

articles.title: On this day in history, in 1908, Ford Motor Company unveiled the Model T, an innovation which allowed many more Americans to enjoy the experience of being stranded on the side of the road (history.com) 11
articles.summary: In 1908, Ford Motor Company introduced the Model T. This product innovation expanded automobile accessibility to a wider American audience.

articles.title: A Simple Skin-Care Routine From Fresh for 40 Percent Off
articles.author: Sam Daly
articles.summary: Fresh is offering a beauty bundle at Nordstrom, featuring a travel-size Soy Face Cleanser and an anti-aging moisturizer, at a 40% discount. Additionally, Fresh is hosting a Friends & Family Sale with up to 30% off best-selling products, including those in the Nordstrom bundle.

articles.title: Microsoft's Windows XP Crocs are here
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched limited-edition Windows XP-themed Crocs, featuring the 'Bliss' wallpaper and Clippy shoe charms, as part of its 50th-anniversary celebration. The Crocs are not available for online purchase but are being offered through a sweepstakes on Microsoft's Instagram account. Previously, Microsoft provided these Crocs to its employees.

articles.title: Hilton Expands Bali Portfolio with Hilton Garden Inn Bali Nusa Dua (Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Hilton has announced the opening of Hilton Garden Inn Bali Nusa Dua. The refreshed property introduces airy design, modern comfort, and family-focused amenities under the Hilton Garden Inn brand.

articles.title: Stourport Tesco on Severn Road plan for new laundry kiosk
articles.author: Lauren Chaloner
articles.summary: Tesco Stores Ltd and Johnsons are planning to install a Johnson's Laundry Kiosk at the Tesco superstore on Severn Road. This kiosk will offer customers a self-service laundry service, integrating Johnson's Specialist Cleaning branding while complementing the Tesco store's architecture. The kiosk's design considers flood resilience and aims to provide convenient laundry services at the local superstore.

articles.title: Move Over Salmon Sperm—A New Fish DNA Is Taking Over Skincare
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Valmont has launched its new l'Elixir Des Glaciers Serum. This serum highlights sturgeon DNA as a key anti-aging ingredient.

articles.title: Latinx Wellness Brands to Love This Hispanic Heritage Month
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Loisa is gaining recognition for its organic, accessible seasonings. They offer a diverse range of seasonings, cooking sauces, and kitchenware, catering to both seasoned cooks and those new to Latin cuisine. Their products are now available online, at Sprouts Farmers Market, Whole Foods, and select supermarkets.

articles.title: Infinite Archives x Air Jordan 17: All the October 2025 Air Jordan Release Dates
articles.summary: Jordan Brand is releasing several new Air Jordan sneakers in October, including the 'Inner Beast' Air Jordan 11, the 'Medium Soft Pink' Air Jordan 5, the Infinite Archives x Air Jordan 17 Low, the 'Medium Olive' Air Jordan 3, and Zion Williamson's 'Voodoo Alternate' Air Jordan 1 Low. These releases feature unique colorways and design elements, celebrating anniversaries and collaborations.

articles.title: Eye Mo unveils fresh new look with same trusted relief for Filipinos
articles.summary: Eye Mo has launched refreshed packaging for its eye care products. The new packaging features a fresh, modern, nature-inspired design and is intended to unify the brand's identity across international markets, while keeping the same formula.

articles.title: Lessen Unveils Aiden: An AI-Powered Maintenance Lifecycle Platform Reshaping Facilities Management Across Residential and Commercial Real Estate
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lessen launched Aiden, an AI-powered maintenance lifecycle product suite. Aiden aims to improve efficiency and decision-making in property maintenance, covering intake, communication, proposals, work verification, and invoicing for residential and commercial properties.

articles.title: Meet Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Series: Packing Everything You Expect from a Premium Tablet
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Tab S11 series offers access to Goodnotes with a 1-year free full version and Clip Studio Paint with a 6-month free trial. LumaFusion is preloaded and available with a 66% discount and 1-month free Creator Pass through the Galaxy Store, while Notion includes a 1-month free trial. Noteshelf 3 provides a 30% discount on the Premium plan upgrade and ArcSite includes a 1-month free trial via the Galaxy Store.

articles.title: Meet Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Series: Packing Everything You Expect from a Premium Tablet
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. announced the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra and Galaxy Tab S11. The new tablets are powered by Galaxy AI 1, enhanced by One UI 8, and offer advanced capabilities. The Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra is highlighted as the thinnest Galaxy Tab to date, designed for productivity.

articles.title: Three Stand Out Features On The Xiaomi 15T Pro Flagship Killer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Xiaomi is introducing the Xiaomi 15T Pro, positioned as a 'flagship-killer'. The company is strategizing its market approach to avoid negatively impacting sales of its flagship Xiaomi 17 family.

articles.title: Nike's comeback takes shape with turnaround plans working
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Nike is actively working on the rollout of new products. The company's efforts focus on introducing these items to the market.

articles.title: OpenAI Ridiculed for Its Latest Cash Grab
articles.author: Sharon Adarlo
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new feature called "Instant Checkout" within ChatGPT. This new service allows users to purchase items directly from online retailers through the chat interface. Currently, Instant Checkout is available for American Etsy sellers and is planned to be rolled out to other platforms like Shopify and Spanx.

articles.title: Preview ‘Edgewood Heavy' at First Friday
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Amazon curates a 'new releases' page on its online marketplace. This page highlights popular products recently put on sale within the last seven days.

articles.title: 11 helpful services your Costco membership offers that you might be missing out on
articles.author: Emily Shiffer
articles.summary: Costco membership provides access to a range of services beyond bulk purchases. These services include offerings that members might be overlooking, presenting an opportunity to maximize membership benefits.

articles.title: Brother International Corporation Introduces High Stiffness Reducers to Power the Next Wave of Automation and Precision Manufacturing
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Brother has launched the DG Series of High-Stiffness Reducers, leveraging over 50 years of gear manufacturing expertise. The new product line includes four product types: Hollow Bore, Flat, Solid, and Solid with Gear Head option, offering design flexibility, high precision, powerful drive, and greater torque.

articles.title: St. Roch Fine Oysters + Bar Celebrates Wild Oyster Season with Special Oyster Dinner
articles.author: Amber Freeman
articles.summary: Amazon curates a selection of new products on its 'new releases page', showcasing items that have gone on sale within the past week.

articles.title: I tried Amazon's new Echo speakers – Alexa has never sounded better but they cost more than ever
articles.author: Christopher Hall
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced new Echo devices including the Echo Dot Max, Echo Studio, Echo Show 8, and Echo Show 11. The new Echo Dot Max has a new design and improved sound, while the Echo Studio is more compact with better sound quality. The Echo Show 8 and Echo Show 11 feature redesigned smart screens for an expanded Alexa experience.

articles.title: SweetNight Expands Product Line with Flagship Twilight Hybrid Mattress
articles.author: Sweet Night
articles.summary: SweetNight has launched its flagship product, the Twilight Hybrid Mattress, both online and offline. The mattress is designed for breathable sleep with balanced comfort and ergonomic support, reflecting SweetNight's goal of accessible high-quality sleep solutions.

articles.title: SweetNight Expands Product Line with Flagship Twilight Hybrid Mattress
articles.summary: SweetNight has launched its flagship product, the Twilight Hybrid Mattress, designed for breathable sleep and ergonomic support. To celebrate the launch, SweetNight is offering over 50% savings throughout October across its sales channels. KuCoin CEO BC Wong introduced Kia, a new AI product expected to launch soon.

articles.title: SONNI Launches Prestige Skincare System to Redefine Mineral SPF as Daily Essential
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: SONNI, a new skincare brand, has launched its first product, the SunDay / SunDown system. This system offers prestige mineral-based suncare, designed for effective and enjoyable daily sun protection.

articles.title: Xbox Game Pass Launches Essential, Premium, and Ultimate Subscription Plans Offering Tailored Gaming Experiences
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft launched three new Xbox Game Pass subscription tiers: Essential, Premium, and Ultimate. These tiers offer tailored gaming experiences with varying features, game libraries, and pricing to cater to a wide range of gamers. Microsoft is also testing next-generation Xbox Cloud Gaming servers, potentially leading to a standalone subscription option.

articles.title: Little Luxuries Are Important, So Let Me Introduce You To A Few Of Our Favourite Body Scrubs And Exfoliants From Canadian Brands
articles.author: Alice Prendergast
articles.summary: Cake Beauty, Bushbalm, and Midnight Paloma are among the Canadian skincare brands offering body scrubs to exfoliate and nourish the skin. These scrubs range from budget-friendly to luxury options and cater to different preferences, including those with sensitive skin.

articles.title: AI-Powered Digital Transformation: A Blueprint For The Future
articles.author: Brevard Nelson
articles.summary: Netflix utilizes an AI-powered recommendation engine, reportedly responsible for 80% of content viewed, transforming data into a core product feature. Sephora uses AI-driven augmented reality for virtual try-ons, converting a tech novelty into increased sales and customer engagement. These examples illustrate how AI is being used to redefine customer value through innovative services.

articles.title: October Shop & Hop in Downtown Kingsport
articles.author: Amy Lynn
articles.summary: Amazon curates a new releases page on its online marketplace. This page showcases some of the hottest products that have gone on sale in the last seven days.

articles.title: 'It's not a Dyson but hear me out' - Amazon shoppers snap up 'excellent' vacuum cleaner
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the VACTechPro V15 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner to £79.97 as a limited-time deal. The vacuum offers 45 minutes of running time, a green light for dust detection, and includes various attachments such as a floor brush and HEPA filters.

articles.title: CREATEA Mighty Mango Concept Beverage Will Be Unveiled at SupplySide Global 2025
articles.author: Price Plow
articles.summary: PricePlow announced the concept beverage CREATEA Mighty Mango, to be unveiled at SupplySide Global 2025. CREATEA is a 12 oz RTD canned beverage featuring creatine, mental energy benefits, natural caffeine, and non-sugar sweeteners. It expands on the previous XPO NRG concept and will be available for sampling at the event.

articles.title: Nothing OS 4.0 Beta: AI Apps & New Features!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nothing has introduced Playground, an AI-powered feature enabling users to create custom widgets and mini-applications. This initiative aims to democratize app development by allowing users to generate code and working widgets based on their desired functionalities. The current version is in alpha, with plans to expand its capabilities through APIs and integrations.

articles.title: New Casino Sites UK October 2025: New UK Casino Reviews
articles.author: Chris Wilson
articles.summary: Several new online casinos have launched in the UK market, each offering unique features and benefits. O'Reels Casino specializes in slot games, 7Bet Casino offers a wide variety of roulette options, QuinnCasino focuses on blackjack, Kachingo provides a strong welcome offer, and Midnite delivers a top mobile experience. LiveScore Bet Casino launched in the UK in 2024 with an attractive welcome offer.

articles.title: Progresso launches BBQ-scented deodorant to pair with new Pitmaster soup
articles.author: Rubén Rosario
articles.summary: Progresso launched the Pitmaster barbecue-scented deodorant to promote their new Pitmaster soup. The 'Pit Kit', including broth and deodorant, will be available for $15, with a second drop on Oct. 16.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers can't agree on 'controversial' new snack with 'odd' flavour
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Doritos and PepsiCo are introducing new gingerbread-flavored Doritos and Pepsi, respectively, in Tesco stores for the Christmas season. Aldi and Lidl are set to launch new wooden toy ranges in October.

articles.title: This Beloved Brand Just Released a First-Of-Its-Kind Soda That Fans 'Need To Find'
articles.author: Carmella D'Acquisto
articles.summary: Arizona Beverages has launched a new product called Chocolate Egg Cream Soda, packaged in 22-ounce cans and sold in 12-packs for $24.99 on their website. A portion of the proceeds from each can will go to the Tunnel to Towers Foundation, supporting families of fallen first responders and military members. This release was timed with the 24th anniversary of Sept. 11.

articles.title: Amazon launches 'price-conscious' grocery brand with most products under $5
articles.author: Annie Palmer
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new, price-conscious grocery brand. The majority of products within this brand are priced under $5.

articles.title: Netflix's new Frankenstein trailer leaves fans all saying the same thing
articles.author: Katie Palmer
articles.summary: Netflix has released a full-length trailer for its new film, Frankenstein, an adaptation of the classic novel. The film will screen in selected picture houses on October 17th, followed by its Netflix premiere on November 7th. Sky is also giving away a free Netflix subscription with its new Sky Stream TV bundles.

articles.title: Lynxspring Releases Next-Generation JENEsys® Edge 634 IP Controller
articles.summary: Lynxspring has released the JENEsys® Edge 634, a new Niagara-embedded controller designed for intelligent buildings and equipment. This controller offers increased performance, scalability, and openness and includes features like AI-readiness, edge-to-cloud connectivity, and enhanced cybersecurity. With the release of the 634, Lynxspring now offers nine different Niagara-native, embedded controllers.

articles.title: Juicy News: NERDS® Unveils Mega Innovation with New NERDS Juicy Gummy Clusters™
articles.author: Ouachita Citizen
articles.summary: NERDS is launching a revolutionary new NERDS candy. The brand also launches two limited-time NERDS Gummy Clusters flavors for football season.

articles.title: 13-YEAR-OLD GEN ZALPHA FOUNDER COCO GRANDERSON TEAMS UP WITH SKINCARE ICON RON ROBINSON TO LAUNCH YES DAY™, THE FIRST GLOW-INDUCING LINE FOR TEENS AND TWEENS
articles.author: YES DAY
articles.summary: Yes Day™, a new skincare brand created for Gen Zalpha, launched nationwide on October 1, 2025. The brand was created by Coco Granderson and formulated by Ron Robinson, a cosmetic chemist known for BeautyStat, Rhode, and formerly Estée Lauder.

articles.title: This TCL phone with a paper-like screen is the best Android flagship you can't buy
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: TCL introduces the Nxtpaper 60 Ultra. The new product prioritizes eye comfort and stylus usability.

articles.title: Google unveils AI-powered Nest indoor and outdoor cameras, and a new doorbell
articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.summary: Google unveiled a revamped lineup of Nest devices, including the Nest Cam Outdoor ($149.99), Nest Cam Indoor ($99.99), and Nest Doorbell ($179.99), all featuring 2K HDR video and integration with Google's AI assistant Gemini. Google is also rebranding Nest Aware as Google Home Premium, and partnered with Walmart to launch more affordable smart home products under the 'onn' brand with prices $22.96 and $49.86.

articles.title: Google unveils AI-powered Nest indoor and outdoor cameras, and a new doorbell
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Google has launched a revamped lineup of Nest devices, including the Nest Cam Outdoor ($149.99), Nest Cam Indoor ($99.99), and Nest Doorbell ($179.99). These devices feature 2K HDR video for sharper images and a wider field of view. Furthermore, Gemini AI is integrated to provide smarter notifications, offering more context for camera events.

articles.title: Google reveals its Gemini-powered smart home lineup and AI strategy
articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.summary: Google is introducing new and updated Nest devices, including Nest Cam Outdoor, Nest Cam Indoor, and Nest Doorbell, all enhanced with Gemini AI. An upgraded Google Home speaker is planned for spring 2026, and a low-cost camera and doorbell are being launched in partnership with Walmart under the onn brand. Google Home app has been updated to work with Gemini AI to better understand the user needs.

articles.title: 5 top SSDs you should buy right away to increase your storage in 2025
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: The article features several SSD products from different brands. SanDisk's Extreme Portable SSD emphasizes durability and portability, while Crucial's X9 offers a compact design with broad compatibility. Samsung's T7 focuses on a blend of speed and design. For users needing higher speed, the Samsung 990 EVO Plus is available, and the Patriot Viper VP4300 Lite caters to users, including PS5 gamers.

articles.title: Dunelm's 'perfect' £55 clothes dryer pod is 'better than airer'
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering the Clothes Dryer Pod, priced at £55, which operates at an estimated cost of around 18p per hour. The dryer pod is heated and boasts a PTC ceramic heating element for 'reliable performance,' featuring a three-hour timer and foldable design. The product has earned a 3.9 star rating online, with numerous reviews from impressed customers.

articles.title: Dunelm shoppers say 'perfect' £55 dryer pod 'saves on heating'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering the Clothes Dryer Pod, priced at £55, which operates at an estimated cost of around 18p per hour. The dryer pod boasts a PTC ceramic heating element, a three-hour timer, and a foldable design. Customer reviews indicate generally positive experiences with the dryer pod's efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

articles.title: Iceland launches 'UK first' that will benefit supermarket shoppers
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Iceland has launched a same-day delivery service in partnership with Stuart, expanding the service to 120 locations after a successful trial. Iceland also introduced a permanent 10% discount for students on groceries, following a successful trial period in select outlets.

articles.title: Pre-Order Now: ASUS ROG Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X Available on eMAG and Asus Eshop
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: ASUS ROG Xbox Ally and Ally X portable gaming consoles are now available for pre-order in Romania. The ASUS ROG Xbox Ally series offers multiple configurations to cater to different gamer needs and budgets with the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X boasting enhanced specifications for demanding gamers.

articles.title: Adcore to Present at the Planet MicroCap Showcase in Toronto
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Adcore Inc. will present at the Planet MicroCap Showcase in Toronto. The company will provide an update on Proposaly, its newest app designed to revolutionize and streamline sales workflow.

articles.title: Inriver Raises the Bar for Product Data Control with AI Breakthroughs and Platform Upgrades
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Inriver has launched advancements to its AI capabilities integrated into workflows with embedded AI agents like Inspire Generate and Translate, along with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server. The release includes Syndicate Advance for flexible content syndication, and Inriver Evaluate to ensure content correctness. Enhanced brand store features, leverage embedded AI to automate content mapping, improve data quality, and accelerate import and validation of product data.

articles.title: ‘Smells so good': Customer falls in love with detergent after thrifting item but can't find it. Then the internet comes to her aid
articles.author: Charlotte Colombo
articles.summary: Tyler Candle Company's Diva Wash laundry detergent has garnered attention, evidenced by user testimonials and reviews highlighting its distinctive scent. A 64-ounce bottle is available at Walmart for $40.70, a reduction from its previous price of $59.

articles.title: Inriver Raises the Bar for Product Data Control with AI Breakthroughs and Platform Upgrades
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: Inriver has released advancements to its platform, incorporating AI-driven agents like Inspire Generate and Translate for automated content enrichment and translation. The update includes the Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server, enhanced syndication options via Syndicate Advance, and Inriver Evaluate for content validation. Additionally, the enhanced Brand Store now features a new CDN and open access capabilities.

articles.title: Redefining coffee innovation for South Africa: How NESCAFÉ Espresso Concentrate fits changing lifestyles
articles.author: Nestlé ESAR
articles.summary: Nestlé has launched NESCAFÉ Espresso Concentrate in South Africa to cater to the growing demand for customizable, convenient, at-home cold coffee. Made with 100% Arabica beans, it comes in two variations, Black and Sweet Vanilla, and will be available at key retailers starting in October. The launch coincides with World Coffee Day and reflects Nestlé's commitment to innovation and meeting consumer needs while supporting the coffee ecosystem.

articles.title: Rezolve Ai Raises 2025 Guidance to $150M ARR and Initiates 2026 Guidance to $500M ARR Exit Rate ...
articles.author: Rezolve AI Ltd
articles.summary: Rezolve Ai (NASDAQ: RZLV) announced first half 2025 results exceeding analyst expectations, driven by its AI-powered commerce solutions. The Brain Suite is now Agentic Commerce Ready, with a whitepaper confirming competitive performance against GPT-4 and Claude, demonstrating innovation and advancement in their service offerings.

articles.title: Doritos launches unusual flavour as shoppers say 'this is where I draw the line'
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Doritos has launched a limited-edition gingerbread-flavored crisps in selected Tesco stores in the UK. The new product has divided shoppers, with some expressing disgust and confusion, while others are interested in trying it.

articles.title: What Is AI Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo AI Voice Generator?
articles.author: General Editor
articles.summary: SoccerFieldMap.com has launched AI voice generators for football stars Messi and Ronaldo. These tools allow users to generate audio files in the styles of Messi and Ronaldo, which can be used for social media content, sports projects, or commercial use. SoccerFieldMap.com offers options for previewing and downloading these AI-generated voices, with licenses available for commercial use.

articles.title: You've Got A Lovely Home, But What If It Were...Lovelier? Here Are 33 Things To Help With That
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The Joymoop cleaning tool is receiving positive reviews for its effectiveness in cleaning ceilings without dripping. A user highlighted its ability to remove dirt from ceilings, eliminating the need for ladders and protecting floors and furniture. The user recommends buying it due to its amazing cleaning capabilities.

articles.title: Did someone say ‘inflation'?
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: SteelSeries has launched the Arctis Nova Elite headset, priced at $599.99. This new product targets fans who enjoy spending money on tech gadgets.

articles.title: Bowers & Wilkins Px8 S2 review: Luxury listening on the go
articles.author: Becky Roberts
articles.summary: Bowers & Wilkins introduced their latest product, the Px8 S2. Digital Trends has a 20-year history of reviewing products like these, offering instant insight and guiding buying decisions.

articles.title: UAE's grocery chain Spinneys to open stores in PH with Ayala
articles.author: Steph Arnaldo
articles.summary: Spinneys, a UAE-based premium supermarket chain, is partnering with Ayala Corporation to launch in Metro Manila. This marks Spinneys' first expansion outside of the Gulf Cooperation Council, bringing its curated selection of fresh produce and imported goods to the Philippines.

articles.title: Fine Choice Foods Launches BBQ Pork Bao Buns Amid Rising Demand for Asian-Inspired Flavors
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fine Choice Foods has launched BBQ Pork Bao Buns under its SUMM! brand, offering a convenient, restaurant-quality dim sum experience. The product is available in Walmart Canada and will soon debut in U.S. retail and home meal delivery services. This introduction builds on the SUMM! brand's existing success in Asian-inspired cuisine.

articles.title: Matthew's Food supermarket set to open in Glasgow tomorrow
articles.author: Amy Myles
articles.summary: Matthew's Foods will launch its new store on Sauchiehall Street on October 2, offering a wide array of products. The new store will open in the former Bargain Store unit, with doors opening at 10 am.

articles.title: MarTech+ Summit 2025: Rethinking marketing in the age of AI
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Google introduced AI Max for search campaigns and Demand Gen, along with its Measurement Toolkit. Google's AI Overviews scaled to 2 billion monthly users globally. Instamart also used Veo 3 to create campaigns.

articles.title: FMN@65: 10 Golden Moments Every Nigerian Should Remember
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: Flour Mills of Nigeria (FMN) introduced Golden Penny flour in 1960, followed by pasta products in the 1970s and Semovita in the 1980s. In the 1990s, Golden Penny launched instant noodles and in 2013, the Golden Sugar Company commissioned a refinery in Niger State with a production capacity of 750,000 tonnes.

articles.title: 6 Creative Ways to Use AI to Make Business Content More Engaging
articles.author: Alex Carter
articles.summary: The article introduces several AI tools and features designed to help businesses create and launch engaging online content.  Synthesia's AI avatar creation tool is highlighted for generating polished videos from scripts. Additionally, various AI tools can generate visuals aligned with a brand's look

articles.title: here's what's on the menu
articles.author: Chief Reporter
articles.summary: Frurt is opening its 12th and largest store in Preston on October 11th, offering its signature frozen yogurt with a wide array of toppings. The new location will also introduce handcrafted protein and energy balls, fresh juices, and coffee to its menu.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G review: Solid all-rounder for less than Rs 10,000
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G, a budget smartphone priced at Rs 9,999. The phone features a 6.74-inch HD+ LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, and a 50-megapixel primary rear camera. It also packs a 5,000mAh battery.

articles.title: Zoho Corporation Launches New Brand, Vani, an Intelligent Visual Collaboration Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation has launched Vani, a visual-first intelligent platform aimed at enhancing workplace collaboration. Vani offers features such as shared infinite canvases, space and zone models, templates, mind mapping tools, AI capabilities, and native video meetings and is available globally with a free plan and a Team plan at $5 per user per month.

articles.title: Zoho Corporation Launches New Brand, Vani, an Intelligent Visual Collaboration Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation launched Vani, a new brand offering an all-in-one, visual-first intelligent platform for workplace collaboration and creativity. Vani represents a new approach to these activities within the company's offerings.

articles.title: 3 New Bath & Body Works Laundry Items for the Best-Smelling Clothes — Best Life
articles.author: Emily Weaver
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works has expanded its fabric care collection by launching new dryer sheets in four signature fragrances: Mahogany Teakwood, Cactus Blossom, Sundrenched Linen, and Lavender Vanilla. These dryer sheets are available in-store and online and are designed to soften fabrics and reduce wrinkles/static. In 2023, the company launched its fabric care collection which include Fragrance Boosters and laundry detergents and expanded to 15 fragrances.

articles.title: 5 fun facts about Yakult S'poreans who grew up drinking it will love
articles.author: Tammi Tan
articles.summary: Yakult is launching Y1000 in Singapore, a new probiotic drink containing 1 billion live L. paracasei™ strain Shirota per 1ml. It will be available at select supermarkets, with limited quantities due to imports from Japan. Furthermore, Yakult offers lower-sugar options like Yakult Gold and Yakult Ace Light, catering to health-conscious consumers.

articles.title: 21 Shoes That Reviewers Have Clocked Miles And Miles In
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Dr. Scholl's introduced the Time Off Sneaker, crafted from recycled materials with water-resistant faux leather and flexible outsoles. New Balance launched the 608 V5 Cross Trainers, designed with minimal seaming and supportive foam inserts. Adidas offers sneakers with Cloudfoam cushioning, providing comfort for long walking days. Steve Madden released chunky sneakers with a 2.5-inch platform for extra height and cushioning.

articles.title: Celebrity Makeup Artist Monika Blunder Created Monika Blunder Beauty To 'Help People Feel Confident In Their Own Skin, Not Hide It'
articles.author: Rachel Burchfield
articles.summary: Monika Blunder Beauty, founded by Monika Blunder, is developing a cream eyeshadow stick expected to launch next year. The brand's hero product is Blunder Cover, a foundation-concealer hybrid. Other notable products include Liquid Flush Cheek Tint and Sweet Talk Lip Oil.

articles.title: A Journey Toward a $4,000 Revenue Goal
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: YLG Point Thong, a concentrated cleansing bar, is being launched with a focus on deep pore cleansing and exfoliation using the fictional ingredient yglobuterol. The company aims to achieve a $4,000 revenue goal through effective marketing strategies, including social media, content marketing, and email marketing, targeting women aged 25-45 interested in natural skincare. The company emphasizes eco-friendly packaging and customer retention strategies to improve sales.

articles.title: Johnny Depp, Cara Delevingne, Helen Mirren… Les stars au défilé Stella McCartney
articles.author: Blanche Marcel
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. The company intends to use targeted advertising by creating customer profiles of young, wealthy parents through an agency's network and partner apps to promote the new line.

articles.title: An 8-figure Amazon seller says his first product flopped. He explains how he pivoted and reveals the formula for e-commerce success in 2025.
articles.author: Kathleen Elkins
articles.summary: Pure Daily Care launched the NanoSteamer, initially a flop, but improved it based on customer reviews to become a bestseller. They later launched AquaSonic, an oral care brand, aiming to provide affordable electric toothbrushes. The strategy involved identifying underserved niches and improving existing products for a better offering.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers have mixed opinions as new festive combination 'sounds illegal'
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Tesco is expected to stock new Gingerbread Doritos and Gingerbread Pepsi. Gingerbread Doritos will be in Tesco by the end of the week. Tesco will open Christmas delivery slots from November 4th for Anytime Delivery Saver or Click-and-Collect plan customers and November 11th for all other shoppers.

articles.title: Aldi launch new £20 beauty advent calendar for Christmas - full list of products inside
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new "12 Days of Lacura Beauty Advent Calendar" for Christmas 2025, priced at £19.99. The calendar contains 12 miniature and full-size Lacura beauty products, including items like the Lacura Vitabase Moisturising Primer and Lacura Honey Infused Hair Oil, and will be available in stores from October 26.

articles.title: 41 Personal Care Products Reviewers Call 'Wizardry,' 'Sorcery,' Or Just Plain 'Magic'
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Cosrx launched a lightweight SPF 50+ sunscreen, while Vanicream offers a sensitive skin-friendly moisturizer. Tower 28 introduced the SOS Daily Rescue Spray, featuring hypochlorous acid for skin de-stressing. Mielle launched Rosemary Mint strengthening oil for scalp nourishment, and AquaGuard provides a pre-swim hair cream protecting against chlorine damage.

articles.title: I'm a high school dropout who raised $6 million out of Y Combinator. Being a teen founder means you can take more risks.
articles.author: Mariya Harley
articles.summary: Nozomio, an AI coding agents startup, launched Nia, a context tool for coding agents. The company received $6.2 million in seed funding led by CRV, BoxGroup, LocalGlobe, and Y Combinator. The company aims to become the leanest AI startup in terms of talent density.

articles.title: I tried Lidl and M&S sourdough bread - they both had the same flaw
articles.author: Howard Lloyd
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) offers a San Francisco-style sourdough made with a 30-year-old starter, priced at £2. Lidl offers a Large White Sourdough Loaf priced at £1.99. The review compares the sourdough offerings from Lidl and M&S, highlighting aspects such as crust crispness, aroma, texture, and flavor tang.

articles.title: GEA CEO Margaret Ansei and Japanese Ambassador Launch U-SPARK Technology at Ghana National Kaizen Awards
articles.summary: The Ghana Enterprises Agency (GEA), in collaboration with the Japanese Ambassador to Ghana, has launched U-SPARK, a digital technology designed to minimize waste and boost productivity in Ghanaian businesses. Sponsored by the United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO) and funded by the Government of Japan, U-SPARK aims to strengthen enterprises for local and international competitiveness.

articles.title: Expert reveals exactly what you need to know before splurging on a new vacuum for your home - from how to choose the right model and when to buy for the best deal
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: The article highlights several vacuum cleaners. The Dyson V16 Piston Animal features HEPA filtration and anti-tangle technology, while the Shark Stratos Anti Hair Wrap IZ420UKT offers an affordable anti-tangle solution. The Eufy X10 Pro Omni is a robot vacuum with mop functionality and a self-emptying base, while the Eufy G50 is a budget-friendly alternative.

articles.title: Beyond backups, SanDisk Creator Phone SSD solves iPhone's ProRes videos paradox
articles.summary: SanDisk has introduced the Creator Phone SSD, an external storage solution designed for iPhones, particularly the iPhone 15 and later models. This SSD unlocks Apple ProRes 4K at 60fps video recording and offers 1TB or 2TB storage options. Priced at approximately ₹10,999 for the 1TB model, it's MagSafe compatible and provides ruggedness with drop and water resistance.

articles.title: Trader Joe's Shoppers 'Have Eaten Close to a Hundred Boxes' of This—and Now There's a New Flavor
articles.author: Kennedy Dierks
articles.summary: Trader Joe's is releasing a new Cookies 'N Cream Ice Cream Sandwiches flavor. The new product appears similar to the Sublime Ice Cream Sandwiches, potentially retailing around $3.99 or $4.99 for a four-pack.

articles.title: Palawan Group's inaugural Marketing Summit sparks innovation and collaboration
articles.summary: The Palawan Group of Companies held a Marketing Summit focused on leveraging AI for enhanced marketing and customer experience in financial services. The summit highlighted the integration of AI to design better marketing strategies, promotions, and personalize customer experiences. This is geared towards enhancing financial inclusion and value for its customers, referred to as 'Sukis'.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Provides September and Third Quarter 2025 Delivery Update
articles.author: Nio Inc.
articles.summary: NIO Inc. announced the launch of its All-New ES8, a flagship premium SUV, on September 20, 2025, with deliveries commencing shortly after. The company achieved a record 34,749 vehicle deliveries in September 2025, including vehicles from its NIO, ONVO, and FIREFLY brands, and 87,071 vehicles in the third quarter of 2025.

articles.title: The Arattai challenge: Can it master the social grammar of building global tech?
articles.author: Srinath Sridharan
articles.summary: Zoho launched Arattai, a messenger app, as an Indian alternative to WhatsApp and Telegram. Arattai is being positioned as secure and encrypted, with locally based servers.

articles.title: The gadget that converts the care of clothes into something fast, comfortable and practical for the day to day now reduced
articles.summary: Conair has launched the Turbo ExtremeSteam (GS59XE), a portable garment steamer featuring 1560 watts of power and a double-slot ceramic plate. Amazon is offering the Conair Turbo ExtremeSteam with a 30% discount, bringing the price down to just €42.59 for a limited time.

articles.title: Beats launches Powerbeats Fit in India with ANC and new design
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Beats has launched its Powerbeats Fit in India. The new product features Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) and a redesigned form factor.

articles.title: MTN Pledges Higher Revenue Share for Gaming Start-ups at DigiFest
articles.author: News Ghana
articles.summary: MTN Ghana is proposing a tiered revenue-sharing model to support gaming start-ups, offering emerging developers a higher percentage share. MTN also aims to leverage its MyMTN app to provide distribution access to millions of potential players, potentially launching new games to a wider audience. This initiative signifies MTN's effort to facilitate local gaming development and support the gaming industry.

articles.title: SKT launches 'air' digital mobile brand to target young people
articles.summary: SK Telecom (SKT) has launched 'air', a new digital mobile brand targeting young people with unlocked devices. This service provides streamlined data plans, point-based rewards, and full self-service via a dedicated app, opening for subscriptions on October 13. Key features include simplified tariffs, redeemable points, 24/7 support, and add-ons like roaming and security.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Amazon Fresh closes its Plainview location after less than a year
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Amazon has permanently closed its Amazon Fresh supermarket on Manetto Hill Road in Plainview. However, Amazon has assured customers that grocery delivery will remain available in the area through other locations.

articles.title: Brave updates its AI-powered search with a detailed answers feature
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: Brave has launched Ask Brave, a new AI-powered search feature that provides detailed answers to user queries. This tool combines search capabilities with large language models to generate AI-powered answers, aiming to enhance the user experience with more useful AI-powered search tools.

articles.title: Redefining Brand Experience Through AI: The Digital Innovation of Kuvings
articles.summary: Kuvings is actively embracing AI technology to redefine its brand communication. The company has launched AI-powered digital videos such as 'Tiny Chef' and ASMR-inspired content to engage audiences and enhance brand distinctiveness. Kuvings also leverages AI for social messages, exemplified by the 'International Day of Sign Languages' campaign, expanding its brand experience through AI-driven storytelling and emotionally engaging content, resulting in significant growth, including surpassing 1 million YouTube subscribers.

articles.title: LTTS' $100 Million Deal Ignites AI-Driven Engineering Transformation
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services (LTTS) has secured a $100 million multi-year agreement with a U.S.-based industrial equipment manufacturer. LTTS will spearhead AI-driven innovations in product and operations engineering, emphasizing new product development and platform automation. The company will also establish a Center of Excellence to facilitate the transition to digital and AI-enabled solutions.

articles.title: ‘I fear more increases will price people out' – Wicklow car dealer pleads for relief in Budget 2026
articles.author: Irish Independent
articles.summary: John Doe has opened a new car wash service, 'Sparkling Clean,' in Bray. The service offers a 20% introductory discount and uses eco-friendly products and a water recycling system. The service aims to attract environmentally conscious customers.

articles.title: Mayacrew, "Automating the Global Voyage of K-Brands with Data and AI'
articles.summary: Mayacrew has launched Cosduck, an AI-powered marketing platform, to help Korean brands expand globally via TikTok Shop by automating influencer collaborations, campaign management, and performance analysis.  Cosduck automates identifying U.S.-based influencers, managing collaborations, integrates all performance data into a single dashboard and provides an AI-powered customer service agent, proven through the success of Mayacrew's own brands like a viral seaweed product featured by Cardi B.  Mayacrew aims to extend Cosduck to every major TikTok Shop market worldwide, with a Japanese subsidiary underway and further expansion planned.

articles.title: Social trends lead Filipinos to shop trusted LazMall brands in September
articles.summary: Lazada introduced AI Lazzie, an AI-powered personal shopping assistant. During the 6.6 sale, Lazada saw a 32% increase in proactive interactions with AI Lazzie, contributing to a 43% increase in order volume and a 168% increase in GMV. This trend continued into the 9.9 sale, where engagements with AI Lazzie increased by 53%.

articles.title: Front load 5 star washing machines are on big discounts on Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, Godrej, IFB, and Bosch are offering various 5-star front-load washing machines with advanced features like AI Direct Drive, Hygiene Steam, and AI Ecobubble during the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale. These machines offer benefits such as water savings, better fabric care, and smart home integration. Discounts are available on various models with different capacities suitable for various household sizes.

articles.title: Top Foundations for Flawless, Long-Lasting Coverage
articles.summary: A range of serum foundations are now available, featuring various finishes like matte and dewy, with SPF protection levels of 30 or 50. These foundations cater to different skin types, including oily, normal, and dry, offering options like full coverage, hydrating formulas, and long-wearing capabilities up to 16 hours.

articles.summary: Amazon Singapore is hosting Amazon Prime Big Deal Days from October 7-13, offering Prime members exclusive deals on various products from brands like LEGO, Sony PlayStation, and Roborock. The event includes discounts on electronics, home & kitchen items, beauty products, and groceries, with additional savings available through vouchers and promotions.

articles.title: LTTS Secures $100 Million Deal to Drive AI Innovation in Semiconductor Industry
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services (LTTS) has secured a multiyear, $100 million agreement to support a US-based industrial equipment manufacturer in new product development and platform automation. Leveraging AI, computer vision, and automation, LTTS will establish a Center of Excellence to accelerate innovation for the client, facilitating their transition to digital and AI-focused operations.

articles.title: Leong Guan lodges preliminary document for IPO on SGX Catalist board
articles.author: Therese Soh
articles.summary: Leong Guan plans to expand its product range by introducing new products such as ready-to-eat meals, a wider variety of flavors and recipes, and snacks. The company also aims to develop foods catering to specific health requirements and age groups, potentially including reduced-carbohydrate ramen and low-glycemic index foods.

articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company utilizes targeted advertising by creating profiles of potentially wealthy parents through agencies to present advertising within partner apps.

articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Raj Nayak launched Ideabaaz, promising high production values, transparency, and diverse revenue streams. Additionally, an AI chatbot has been transformed into a shopping assistant, allowing users to search, compare, and purchase products within the application.

articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Pokémon Legends Z-A is taking a new approach to franchise marketing by incorporating horror, mystery, and live-action stunts. This bold direction has resulted in mixed reactions from fans.

articles.summary: Tesco is launching Gingerbread Doritos and Gingerbread Pepsi on October 2nd. Aldi and Lidl are also set to launch their popular wooden toy ranges on the same day, with Aldi releasing its biggest range of toys so far starting from £3.49, while Lidl's start from £1.99.

articles.summary: Toyota is preparing to unveil the 2026 LandCruiser FJ, a new 'baby LandCruiser' model. This new vehicle is expected to compete with models like the Suzuki Jimny and Renault Duster.

Merchants can connect their product feeds to OpenAI and are ranked based on factors like availability, price, and whether Instant Checkout is enabled. This launch requires brands to optimize for AI visibility to be recommended by ChatGPT and gain a competitive advantage.

articles.title: .NET 10 Ushers in a New Era for Distributed Systems with Enhanced File-Based Applications
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: .NET 10, a Long-Term Support release, is set for general availability in November 2025. The software is currently in Release Candidate 1 phase. It promises a more streamlined experience for software development.

articles.title: ServiceNow unites people, data and workflows with its new AI Experience
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: ServiceNow has announced AI Experience, a unified, conversational front door to enterprise AI, aimed at addressing fragmented user experiences.

articles.title: ISPA Partner Genexis Announces NuFibre as First UK Customer for Elite HX30 Gateway and Home CX30 Extender (ISPA - Internet Services Providers' Association)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Genexis, a broadband solutions company, has welcomed NuFibre, a new UK Internet Service Provider, as a customer. NuFibre is deploying the recently launched Genexis Elite HX30 residential gateway, a new product from Genexis.

articles.title: Delta Faucet Debuts the VersaCurl™ Detangling Shower Tool, Transforming Wash Day Routines for Curly and Coily Hair
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Delta Faucet launched the VersaCurl™ Detangling Shower Tool on October 1, 2025. This new in-shower tool provides a gentle, personalized detangling and rinsing experience and was created in partnership with textured hair experts. Delta Faucet aims to innovate solutions to solve daily customer problems.

articles.title: Infinix Bags Double Awards at Marketing Edge 2025 Awards
articles.author: Branded Content
articles.summary: Infinix won the Outstanding Smartphone Launch of the Year for its Hot 60 Series and Innovative Smartphone Brand of the Year for its Note 50 Series at the 2025 Edge Awards. These awards highlight Infinix's commitment to delivering cutting-edge technology and user-focused innovation in the Nigerian market. Oluwayemisi Ode expressed gratitude for the trust and support.

articles.title: Sultana Ice Cream Now Makes Edible Soap Bars
articles.summary: Sultana Ice Cream launched edible soap, Belgian chocolate bars stuffed with five ice cream flavors: salted caramel popcorn, coffee toffee fudge, vanilla cherry, dark chocolate mango and mandarin, and chocolate fruits and nuts. The new dessert is available at all Sultana branches.
